sentences.en: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
sentences.cn: 你那被雄心壮志压制已久的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

sentences.en: Annie was wonderfully warm and maternal.
Clare's late enthusiasm for Tess had infected her through her maternal sympathies.
sentences.cn: 克来上一次把苔丝夸得那样天花乱坠,把她作母亲的同情心都激起来了.
每个妇女都有母性的天性.

sentences.en: Genetic abnormalities are more often associated with faults in paternal DNA than in maternal DNA.
sentences.cn: 相对于母本DNA，基因畸变往往更多地与父本DNA上的缺陷相关。

sentences.en: Her feelings towards him were almost maternal.
sentences.cn: 她对他的感情是近乎母亲般的。

sentences.en: Her maternal grandfather was Mayor of Karachi.
sentences.cn: 她的外公是卡拉奇市的市长。

sentences.en: I didn't have as strong a maternal instinct as some other mothers.
sentences.cn: 我不像别的母亲那样有那么强烈的母性本能。

sentences.en: Late maternal age has certainly been implicated in mongolism.
sentences.cn: 先天愚型就与高龄生产有关.

sentences.en: Leigh takes a maternal attitude toward the Chinese girl.
sentences.cn: 莉像母亲一般对待这个中国女孩.

sentences.en: Many animals display maternal instincts only while their offspring are young and helpless.
sentences.cn: 许多动物在其幼崽弱小无法自助时都显出了母性的本能.

sentences.en: Maternal smoking can damage the unborn child.
sentences.cn: 母亲吸烟会对胎儿造成不良影响。

sentences.en: She seems to have a strong maternal instinct (= desire to have babies and take care of them ) .
The sight of the hopeless little boy aroused her maternal instincts.
sentences.cn: 那个绝望的小男孩的模样唤起了她的母性.

words.tran_cn: 母性，母道；[妇产] 妇产科医院

phrases.tran_cn: 产妇死亡率，母性死亡率；母死率

trans.tran_cn: 母亲的，母亲般的，母系的，母亲方面的
trans.tran_en: typical of the way a good mother behaves or feels
